<link rel="import" href="../../bower_components/polymer/polymer.html">
<link rel="import" href="../../bower_components/iron-icons/iron-icons.html">
<link rel="import" href="../../bower_components/iron-icon/iron-icon.html">
 
<dom-module id="subvideo-preview">
  <style media="screen">
    #wrapper {
      width: 100%;
      background: #fff;
      overflow: auto;
      padding: 5px;
    }
    .thumbnail {
      position: relative;
      float: left;
      width: 30%;
      padding: 12%;
      box-sizing: border-box;
      background: #DCDCDC;
    }
    #play {
      position: absolute;
      display: none;
      left: 50%;
      top: 50%;
      height: 50px;
      width: 50px;
      margin-left: -25px;
      margin-top: -25px;
      color: #fff;
    }
    .info {
      position: relative;
      width: 64%;
      margin-left: 32%;
      padding: 0 2% 1%;
    }
  </style>
  <template>
    <div id="wrapper"
      on-mouseover="onHover"
      on-mouseout="onHout"
      on-tap="watchSubvideo">
      <div class="thumbnail">
        <iron-icon id="play"
        class="animated fadeIn"
        icon="av:play-circle-filled"></iron-icon>
      </div>
      <div class="info">
        <h4>{{subvideo.name}}</h4>
        <span>{{subvideo.description}}</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </template>
  <script>
    Polymer({
//======================== Polymer Component Methods =========================//
      is: 'subvideo-preview',
      properties: {
        // property that holds the model element: a Subvideo
        subvideo: {
          type: Object,
          value: null,
          observer: "subvideoChanged"
        }
      },
      attached: function() {
        this._background = this.$.wrapper.style.background;
      },
      onHover: function() {
        this.$.wrapper.style.background = '#DCDCDC';
        this.$.play.style.display = "block";
      },
      onHout: function() {
        this.$.wrapper.style.background = this._background;
        this.$.play.style.display = "none";
      },
      subvideoChanged: function() {
        if(this.subvideo){
          this.id = "_"+this.subvideo._id;
        }
      },
      watchSubvideo: function() {
        this.fire('watch-subvideo');
      }
    });
  </script>
</dom-module>
 
Generated by istanbul at Wed Nov 11 2015 02:32:23 GMT-0200 (BRST)
